---
category: news
title: "Imagine, type and get the perfect personalised AI stickers on WhatsApp"
excerpt: "Here is a guide for how to create AI supported stickers on WhatsApp: Open a chat. Tap the emoji option on the built-in key board and then the sticker option within it, or directly, the sticker option when using iOS. Tap Create. If prompted, tap Continue. Enter a description of the sticker you want to create. Up to four stickers will be generated."
